text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That was some real competition... Guess<n>this
means my opponents were a lot<n>stronger than me!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I know! Stopping now just doesn't<n>feel
right!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We've gotta use today as fuel for our<n>next
victory!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
If my foes are this strong, I've gotta get<n>even
stronger! I'll come back swingin'<n>every time until
sweet victory is mine!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I've got this! I'll use this setback as a<n>springboard
to get even faster!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It goes without saying! I'm not gonna let<n>'em push
me around forever!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: ¡Mis piernas no conocen límites!<n>Voy a entrenar hasta caer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I don't plan on lettin' up—everyone on<n>that track
is in for a beatdown!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna treat the crowd to a race so<n>hot, their
blood will start pumpin' too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm ready to go, Teach! I'm gonna jump<n>squat the
whole way back!
